author: sibkatya
content: Hi <@686695036733227017>, do we have today's call shifted for one hour at the European time zone? How it works for calls?

author: tmiychao
content: Calls are scheduled in UTC so it's still 3pm UTC today. If you are in Europe, it would be one hour sooner than before, yes

author: tmiychao
content: <@&857649635274915900> Weekly standup starting <t:1730127600:R>! Don't get confused by the winter time or cohort slowly ending, we are still going and want to hear about your work https://meet.ethereum.org/epf-standup
